attributes.additional_details: I would like you to be aware of the agreements which the job centre are setting up with their clients when they make a claim i agreed back in June to look at the job search website 5 times over the week i had my money sanctioned because they thought i wasn't looking for work i have provided evidence of me looking for work also i asked the lady at the job centre "so if i look on other websites and apply for lots of jobs and i don't look on the job search i will get my benefit stopped for that week or 2 weeks its like there saying if i don't use the job search website will get my benefit stopped even if I'm applying for loads of jobs off different websites.
